g.text: (1)get Server RSA public key(not JWT key)
(3.1)generate RSA private, encrypt Client RSA public
by Server RSA with user credential
and timestamp by Client RSA, add to JWT payload
(4.2) Sign JWT by JWT RSA. Send back
Authentic and Access Check use zero-knowledge to perform access.
Authentic part and Application part should not connect directly to ensure application level can be expanded flat
(5)Send request with JWT, sign request payload, random number, and timestamp with Client RSA
(6.2)Check if Client RSA sign is eligible and
JWT payload has Client RSA public
(Client RSA public is trustable if it is in JWT
(7.2) Access granted. Unzip JWT data and
